main event: A circular object the size of a thumbnail at arm's length, with appearance of a glowp with a disc shape and center, was observed in the sky.
interesting points: The object was first seen to the South, then Northeast about 45 degrees.
The object had the appearance of a globe with a disk around it and was very bright.
The object appeared to have a tail.
The object was observed for approximately 35 minutes.
Binoculars were used to observe the object.
sighted object: circular object with disc shape and center
witnesses: housewife, two students, and an accountant
